title: Most popular social media sites in Norway 2019 , by platform
summary: This bar chart has 10 columns on the x axis representing Platform, and Share of respondents in each Platform on the y axis.
The Share of respondents is highest at Platform Facebook and lowest at Platform Tumblr.
The maximum Platform Facebook has got 41.5 times higher Share of respondents than the minimum Platform Tumblr.
min_summary: This is a bar chart. It shows Share of respondents for 10 number of Platforms.
The Share of respondents is highest at Platform Facebook and lowest at Platform Tumblr.
mid_summary: This bar chart has 10 columns on the x axis representing Platform, and Share of respondents in each Platform on the y axis.
The Share of respondents is highest at Platform Facebook and lowest at Platform Tumblr.
The maximum Platform Facebook has got 41.5 times higher Share of respondents than the minimum Platform Tumblr.
max_summary: This is a bar chart representing Platform in the x axis and Share of respondents in the y axis.
The Share of respondents is highest at Platform Facebook and lowest at Platform Tumblr.
Second maximum Share of respondents is found at Platform Snapchat.
The highest Platform Facebook has 81.0 more Share of respondents than the lowest Platform Tumblr.
Share of respondents at Platform Facebook is 83.0 , second place is Snapchat at 61.0, and thirdly is YouTube at 60.0.
Platform Pinterest, and Whatsapp have a similar Share of respondents that is 16.0.
The Platform Facebook tends to be 2.43 percent higher than average.
